# <code>math max</code> for math

<div class='command-title'>Finds the maximum within a list of numbers or tables</div>

## Signature

```> math max```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Examples

  Find the maximum of list of numbers
```shell
  > [-50 100 25] | math max
```
